SUMMARY: DE - Feature Requests and Wrap up
DESCRIPTION:
{quote}🧩 *FEATURES*

* [FEATURE] Render SVGs for custom data types
* [FEATURE] Map all {{Decimal(19,4)}} fields to the “Currency” data type
* [FEATURE] Format currency with a {{$}} prefix and two fixed decimal places
* [FEATURE] Allow direct page input when clicking the {{...}} in pagination
* [FEATURE] Add Share Feedback feature (same implementation as SM Labs, same destination table)
* [FEATURE] Use the same logged-in user context as SM Labs

🔧 *BUGS*

* [BUG] Fix date picker selecting the day before the chosen date
* [BUG] Allow decimal values in filter input (currently only accepts integers)
* [BUG] Correct layout issues on empty result pages
* [BUG] Update 404 error page to reference “Data Explorer” instead of “Pharmacy”

🛠️ *ENHANCEMENTS*

* [ENHANCEMENT] Replace outdated drag-and-drop SVG with updated version
* [ENHANCEMENT] Format “Showing 1 of 2346234” as “Showing 1 of 2,346,234”
* [ENHANCEMENT] Limit count display to values under 1000{quote}

SUMMARY: Develop Function to Check Servotron Health
DESCRIPTION:
*Summary:* This function will be written in typescript to receive an API endpoint as input and then returns an output regarding the health of the endpoint.

*Location:* The function should be written inside a separate folder in the Trulla Direct Engineering Directory

*Requirements:* 

* The function should be able to return if an endpoint is healthy or not. 
* The function should be configurable to work for multiple API endpoints. 
* The function should have unit tests to cover both healthy and unhealthy situations

*Success Criteria:* All the functional requirements above should be met

*QA Procedure*:

* Review the Pull Request for the Code Base
* Visit this [link on AWS where the lamda is deployed|https://us-east-1.console.aws.amazon.com/lambda/home?region=us-east-1#/functions/AppHealthCheck?tab=testing]
* Click “Test” to test the function and wait for the results. The logs should show that one URL is healthy and the other is unhealthy. The helathy URL is for Servotron.
* You can also check [this AWS log group|https://us-east-1.console.aws.amazon.com/cloudwatch/home?region=us-east-1#logsV2:log-groups/log-group/$252Faws$252Flambda$252FAppHealthCheck] to see results/logs.
